mapper.select:
SELECT id as id, order_no as orderNo, car_no as carNo, link_tel as linkTel, create_time as createTime, prov_code as provCode, city_code as cityCode, area_code as areaCode, visit_fail_count as visitFailCount, visit_time as visitTime, ev_point as evPoint, ev_time as evTime FROM dd_driver_evaluate_info
and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE dd_driver_evaluate_info
order_no = #{orderNo},
car_no = #{carNo},
link_tel = #{linkTel},
create_time = #{createTime},
prov_code = #{provCode},
city_code = #{cityCode},
area_code = #{areaCode},
visit_fail_count = #{visitFailCount},
visit_time = #{visitTime},
ev_point = #{evPoint},
ev_time = #{evTime},
and id = #{id}
